QueryViewSpec.Name: Update Recurring Gift StartDate QA Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: View records that will have their RG StartDate updated.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select rs.ID ,u.SPONSORID ,u.RGID ,u.FIRSTINSTALLMENTDATE ,u.REVENUESCHEDULE_STARTDATE ,u.NTD ,dbo.UFN_REVENUE_STARTDATEVALID(rs.ID, u.FIRSTINSTALLMENTDATE) as STARTDATEVALID --,cast(rs.STARTDATE as DATE) as rs_STARTDATE ,cast(ft.DATE as DATE) as FINANCIALTRANSACTIONDATE --,ft.ID --,ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID -- u.* from dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rs join FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rs.ID join dbo.USR_REVENUESCHEDULE_BEFORE_STARTDATE_UPDATE u on u.RGID = ft.CALCULATEDUSERDEFINEDID;
